roleDialog.title: Change user role
roleDialog.info:
Administrator: 250 AI messages limit per month
Worker: 50 AI messages limit per month
roleDialog.success: User {{name}} role has been changed to {{role}}

permissionsDialog.title: Manage user permissions
permissionsDialog.info: Administrators automatically have all permissions. Permissions can only be configured for workers.

canAccessDashboard.name: Dashboard
canAccessDashboard.description: Access to dashboard, task board, work time and schedule

canAccessAnalytics.name: Analytics
canAccessAnalytics.description: Access to financial reports and production analytics

canAccessHallData.name: Hall parameters
canAccessHallData.description: Access to environmental conditions, machines and hall forms

canAccessSales.name: Sales
canAccessSales.description: Access to invoices, customer orders, price lists and quotations

canAccessProduction.name: Production
canAccessProduction.description: Access to production tasks, recipes, calculator and timeline

canAccessInventory.name: Inventory
canAccessInventory.description: Access to inventory levels, CMR, purchase orders and suppliers

canAccessCRM.name: CRM
canAccessCRM.description: Access to contacts, interactions and sales opportunities

canCompleteStocktaking.name: Complete stocktaking
canCompleteStocktaking.description: Permission to complete stocktaking and update inventory levels

errors.noPermission: You don't have permission to perform this action
errors.noPermissionStocktaking: You don't have permission to complete stocktaking. Contact administrator.
